name: Bonsai Tower
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare.

Climb the Bonsai Tower to collect all the bonsai! This is no simple task; you will have to 'shapeshift' the tower to reach all the bonsai. Rotate parts of the tower to reach new areas!

It is strongly recommended you do not jump down where there is no ladder to get back up the where you were. We cannot guarantee that you cannot get stuck if you do. If you do it anyway and do get stuck, you can press R to restart.
